name: Ten Pin Alley [PSX]
description: It's bowling the way you like it - without the shoes! So sit back, grab a ball and get ready for the bowling experience of a lifetime! Actual pin physics give you a pro-caliber bowling experience. 12 colorful characters with dozens of outrageous reactions. Three bowling centers to choose from, with all the variety, sights and sounds of real bowling. Select ball weight and cover stock. Realistic lane conditions affect how the ball travels down the lane.
